name: Survive the Improv Show
description: ‘Survive the Improv Show’ is a goofy little text adventure. You are performing a show with your improv team, 'The Texties,' at a local comedy theatre. Despite your team’s expert use of puns and rubber chicken object work, the audience is becoming unruly. Can you escape the improv show? Or will you save your team from tanking before time runs out?
